intro: Ozothamnus ramosus, commonly known as the silverleaf dandelion, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It is a perennial herb that typically grows in dry, sandy soils and is often found in coastal areas. The plant features silver-gray foliage and produces bright yellow composite flowers that bloom in spring. It is adapted to withstand drought conditions and has a widespread distribution across southern Australia. Ozothamnus ramosus is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
